    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:48.480
    | text      = Last week, Jordan, we talked about how it would be too difficult to do an episode about the election
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:53.360
    | text      = to be released on that Wednesday
}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:55.879

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:59.879
    | text      = At that point, there was just too much uncertainty
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:02.480
    | text      = It felt very difficult to discuss the whole thing without having any feelings of closure about the election itself
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:08.720
    | text      = Now, as it stands on Sunday, as we record Monday's show, there's a bit more of a sense of finality
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:23.480
    | text      = Everybody celebrating the Biden win owes a huge raise of the glass to the on-the-ground organizers and voter registration activists

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = in those battleground states that could easily have gone the other way

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:41.759

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:43.920

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:52.199

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:53.920

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:57.040

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:58.480
    | text      = That was a very good... I was like, yeah, that was the time when you're like, or maybe not, fuck you, Dan
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:03.120
    | text      = I had a bit of a realization, Jordan
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:05.319
    | text      = A large part of the motivation for me doing this podcast was my revulsion at seeing Alex and his crew laughing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:10.800
    | text      = at the diverse crowds of Hillary supporters crying on election night 2016
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:14.879
    | text      = mocking what was, for many of them, a very real and justified existential fear
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:20.160
    | text      = So now, the tables are turned a little bit, and we have an opportunity to laugh at his behavior on election night when things didn't go his way
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:27.639
    | text      = Do we mock his tears, comfortable in the knowledge that they're probably fake?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:31.399
    | text      = And even if they are real, the things he's afraid of aren't real?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:35.480
    | text      = Is it just as bad for me to do a show where I relish in his election night lows?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:40.879
    | text      = Obviously, the answer to that is no, it wouldn't be just as bad for me to do that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:45.360
    | text      = Oh, of course not
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:45.879
    | text      = It would be totally cool, and maybe fun
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:48.160
    | text      = It'd be fine, it'd be great, I'd love it
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:50.120
    | text      = But also, I'm not going to do that, but for slightly different reasons
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:53.639
    | text      = What Alex Jones did on election night literally doesn't matter
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:57.120
    | text      = We can mock his freaking out and yelling the same bullshit he yells every day
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:01.160
    | text      = We can discuss his very dubious claim that he decided not to go on Rogan's livestream of his own accord
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:07.720
    | text      = We can talk about his obvious intentions to incite violence, but here's the thing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:12.040
    | text      = The most disrespectful thing I think you can do in terms of Alex's election night coverage

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
